SEARCH
Package servlets

Class ConfLoader

java.lang.Object
servlets.ConfLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Servlet
public class ConfLoader extends Object implements Servlet
Servlet that handles configuration file uploads and generates a computational graph visualization. This servlet: 1. Receives uploaded configuration files via POST requests 2. Parses multipart form data to extract file content 3. Saves files server-side with unique names 4. Creates a GenericConfig from the file 5. Generates a Graph from the configuration 6. Returns an HTML response with the graph visualization
